start.text: Be ready to pay up, we'll be back before you know it.
You'd better have our pay ready and waiting.
Here it comes. Let's fly into the center.
Let's do this right. We've got the pride it takes to win.
We've got radar contact. They've come to greet us at the door.

start_boss.text: This is gonna cost you extra.
Those who survive a long time on the battlefield start to think they're invincible.
It's not over, buddy. This is where it all starts. You know what I'm talkin' about, right?
Nobody wants to bail out into a flaming star. We're counting on you, captain.
No affiliations or ranks to hinder us. The only rule of engagement is to survive.
This is where it all starts. You know what I'm talkin' about, right?
There's only one way, Buddy. You've gotta fight for what you believe in.
No manual's gonna tell you how to fight this battle.

retreat.text: Yeah, well. I've had my fill of goin' home without wings.
We're going to start over from scratch.
Guess they've come to pick on the dead again.

out_of_missiles.text: This war would end if we could blow everything up.
Negative, no ammo left. All I've got is regular ordinance.

engaged.text: Dead men's words hold no meaning.
Looks like we've both still got what it takes.
Time to dive into the fireworks!
Let's get up close and personal!
If you get shot down, crash where I can't see.

need_help.text: Ruthless attacks aren't gonna cut it with these guys.
These guys know what they're doing. Don't let up, even when they're locked on.

pursuing.text: They're in a panic out there. We just might be able to win this.
Atta way! Mop 'em up nice and quick!
It takes more than just a fancy ship to fly like that. You've gotta fight for what you believe in.
We gotta strike while the iron's hot.

running.text: They're gonna give us all they've got.
It seems they're on to us.
This is bad! I'm outta here!

hull_90.text: You fired up? Come shoot me down.
Those who survive a long time on the battlefield start to think they're invincible. I bet you do too, Buddy.
This is gonna cost you extra.
Things are gonna get tricky if reinforcements show up.

hull_50.text: I don't have time for that. It's every man for himself.
This chunk of space doesn't sit well with me.
When we face each other, we can finally see our true selves!
Guess they really don't want us to get through...

hull_30.text: You're here to pull me off in a magical carriage... to hell I suppose...
These guys are definitely pros. I can't find a weakness.

overload.text: I'm in a jam here, just give me a minute.

death.text: This twisted game needs to be reset.
This is where we go our separate ways.

victory.text: I got a feeling you and me are gonna get along just fine. Buddy.
Those guys are history. Let's wrap things up here.
You hear that warm welcome? It's the sweet sound of victory.
Looks like we live to see another day.

victory_boss.text: Yo buddy, you've got everyone fired up and believing in miracles.
